description: Banner and Footer UI Enhancement - Add a visible header banner and dynamic footer to the Hello World practice app

userStories.title: Add header banner
userStories.description: As a visitor, I want to see a banner at the top of the page so I know this is a practice app built with Amp + Ralph.
acceptanceCriteria: Banner appears at the very top of the page (above existing content)
Banner text reads: "Practice App – built with Amp + Ralph"
Banner is visually distinct (e.g., background color, centered text)
Banner is responsive and readable on mobile
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add dynamic year footer
userStories.description: As a visitor, I want to see a footer at the bottom of the page showing the current year so I know the site is maintained.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer appears at the bottom of the page
Year is generated dynamically via JavaScript (not hardcoded)
Footer is styled consistently with the page
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
